Verses: 1 pinnum Isravel Puththirar Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaargal; Appozhudhu Karththar Avargalai Ezhu Varusham Meedhiyaaniyarin Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar .

2 meedhiyaaniyarin Kai Isravelin Melpalaththukkondapadiyaal, Isravel Puththirar Meedhiyaaniyar Nimiththam Thangalukku Malaigalilulla Kebigalaiyum Kugaigalaiyum Aranaana Sthalangalaiyum Adaikkalangalaakkikkondaargal.
3 isravelar Vidhai Vidhaiththirukkum Podhu, Meedhiyaaniyarum Amalekkiyarum Kizhakkaththip Puththirarum Avargalukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbi Vandhu;
4 avargalukku Edhire Paalayamirangi, Kaasaavin Ellaimattum Nilaththin Vilaichchalaik Keduththu, Isravelile Aagaaraththaiyaagilum, Aadumaadugal Kazhudhaigalaiyaagilum Vaikkaadhe Povaargal.

5 avargal Thangal Mirugajeevangalodum, Thangal Koodaarangalodum, Vettukkiligalaippol Thiralaai Varuvaargal; Avargalum Avargal Ottagangalum Ennimudiyaadhadhaayirukkum; Indhappragaaramaaga Dhesaththaik Keduththuvida Adhile Varuvaargal.
6 ippadi Meedhiyaaniyaraale Isravelar Migavum Sirumaippattaargal; Appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Karththarai Nokki Muraiyittaargal.
7 isravel Puththirar Meedhiyaaniyar Nimiththam Karththarai Nokki Muraiyittapodhu,

8 karththar Oru Theerkkadharisiyai Avargalidaththirku Anuppinaar; Avan Avargalai Nokki: Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal: Naan Ungalai Egipthilirundhu Varavum, Adimaiththana Veettilirundhu Purappadavum Seydhu,
9 egipthiyar Kaiyinindrum, Ungalai Odukkina Yaavarudaiya Kaiyinindrum Ungalai Ratchiththu, Avargalai Ungalukku Munbaagath Thuraththi, Avargal Dhesaththai Ungalukkuk Koduththu,

10 naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endrum, Neengal Kudiyirukkum Avargal Dhesaththilulla Emoriyarudaiya Dhevargalukku Bayappadaadhirungal Endrum, Ungalukku Sonnen; Neengalo En Sollaik Kelaadheponeergal Engiraar Endru Sonnaan.

11 adharkuppinbu Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Vandhu, Abiyesriyanaana Yovaasin Ooraagiya Opraavilirukkum Oru Karvaalimaraththinkeezh Utkaarndhaar; Appozhudhu Avanudaiya Kumaaran Kidhiyon Kodhumaiyai Meedhiyaaniyarin Kaikkuth Thappuvikkiradharkaaga, Aalaikku Sameebamaai Adhaip Poradiththaan.
12 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Avanukku Dharisanamaagi: Paraakkiramasaaliye Karththar Unnode Irukkiraar Endraar.

13 appozhudhu Kidhiyon Avarai Nokki: Aa En Aandavane, Karththar Engalode Irundhaal, Ivaiyellaam Engalukku Neriduvaanen? Karththar Engalai Egipthilirundhu Konduvaravillaiyaa Endru Engal Pidhaakkal Engalukku Vivariththuchchonna Avarudaiya Arpudhangalellaam Enge? Ippozhudhu Karththar Engalaik Kaivittu, Meedhiyaaniyar Kaiyil Engalai Oppukkoduththaare Endraan.
14 appozhudhu Karththar Avanai Nokkippaarththu: Unakku Irukkira Indha Balaththode Po; Nee Isravelai Meedhiyaaniyarin Kaikku Neengalaakki Ratchippaai; Unnai Anuppugiravar Naan Allavaa Endraar.
15 adharku Avan: Aa En Aandavare, Naan Isravelai Edhinaale Ratchippen; Idho, Manaaseyil En Kudumbam Migavum Eliyadhu; En Thagappan Veettil Naan Ellaarilum Siriyavan Endraan.
16 adharkuk Karththar: Naan Unnodekooda Iruppen; Ore Manushanai Muriya Adippadhupola Nee Meedhiyaaniyarai Muriya Adippaai Endraar.
17 appozhudhu Avan: Ummudaiya Kangalil Ippozhudhum Enakkuththayai Kidaiththadhaanaal Ennode Pesugiravar Dhevareerdhaan Endru Enakku Oru Adaiyaalaththaik Kaattavendum.
18 naan Ummidaththirku En Kaanikkaiyaik Konduvandhu, Umakku Munbaaga Vaikkumalavum, Ivvidam Vittuppogaadhiruppeeraaga Endraan; Adharku Avar: Nee Thirumbivarumattum Naan Iruppen Endraar.

19 udane Kidhiyon Ulle Poi, Oru Vellaattukkuttiyaiyum Oru Marakkaal Maavile Pulippillaadha Appangalaiyum Aayaththappaduththi, Iraichchiyai  Oru Koodaiyil Vaiththu, Aanaththai Oru Kinnaththil Vaarththu, Adhai Veliye Karvaalimaraththin Keezhirukkira Avaridaththil Konduvandhu Vaiththaan.
20 appozhudhu Dhevanudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Avanai Nokki: Nee Iraichchiyaiyum Pulippillaadha Appangalaiyum Eduththu, Indhak Karpaaraiyin Mel Vaiththu Aanaththai Ootru Endraar; Avan Appadiye Seydhaan.

21 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Thamadhu Kaiyilirundha Kolin Nuniyai Neetti, Iraichchiyaiyum Pulippillaadha Appangalaiyum Thottaar; Appozhudhu Akkini Karpaaraiyilirundhu Ezhumbi, Iraichchiyaiyum Pulippillaadha Appangalaiyum Patchiththadhu; Karththarin Thoodhanovendraal, Avan Kangalukku Maraindhu Ponaar.
22 appozhudhu Kidhiyon, Avar Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Endru Kandu: Aiyo, Karththaraana Aandavare, Naan Karththarudaiya Thoodhanai Mugamugamaaik Kandene Endraan.
23 adharkuk Karththar: Unakku Samaadhaanam; Bayappadaadhe, Nee Saavadhillai Endru Sonnaar.
24 ange Kidhiyon Karththarukku Oru Palipeedaththaik Katti, Adharku Yegovaa Shaalom Endru Perittaan; Adhu Innaalvaraikkum Abiyesriyarin Ooraagiya Opraavil Irukkiradhu.

25 andru Raaththiriyile Karththar Avanai Nokki: Nee Un Thagappanukku Irukkira Kaalaigalil Ezhu Vayadhaana Irandaam Kaalaiyaik Kondupoi, Un Thagappanukku Irukkira Paagaalin Palipeedaththaith Thagarththu, Adhin Arugeyirukkira Thoppai Vettippottu,

26 indhak Karpaarai Uchchiyile Paangaana Oru Idaththil Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Oru Palipeedaththaik Katti, Andha Irandaam Kaalaiyaik Konduvandhu, Adhai Nee Vettippotta Thoppinudaiya Kattai Viragugalin Mel Sarvaanga Thaganamaagap Paliyidakkadavaai Endraar.

27 appozhudhu Kidhiyon, Than Velaiyaatkalil Paththupperai Serththu, Karththar Thanakku Sonnapadiye Seydhaan; Avan Than Thagappan Kudumbaththaarukkum Andha Oor Manusharukkum Bayappattapadiyinaale, Adhaip Pagalile Seyyaamal, Iravile Seydhaan.

28 andha Oor Manushar Kaalame Ezhundhirundhapodhu, Idho, Paagaalin Palipeedam Thagarkkappattadhum, Adhin Arugeyirundha Thoppu Vettippodappattadhum, Kattappattirundha Palipeedaththinmel Andha Irandaam Kaalai Paliyidappattadhumaayirukka Avargal Kandu;
29 oruvaraiyoruvar Nokki: Indhak Kaariyaththai Seydhavan Yaar Endraargal; Kettu Visaarikkirapodhu, Yovaasin Magan Kidhiyon Idhai Seydhaan Endraargal.
30 appozhudhu Ooraar Yovaasai Nokki: Un Maganai Veliye Kondu Vaa; Avan Paagaalin Palipeedaththaith Thagarththu, Adhin Arugeyirundha Thoppai Vettippottaan, Avan Saagavendum Endraargal.

31 yovaas Thanakku Virodhamaaga Nirkira Anaivaraiyum Paarththu: Neengalaa Paagaalukkaaga Vazhakkaaduveergal? Neengalaa Adhai Ratchippeergal? Adharkaaga Vazhakkaadugiravan Indru Kaalaiyile Thaane Saagakkadavan; Adhu Dhevanaanaal Than Palipeedaththaith Thagarththadhinimiththam, Adhu Thaane Thanakkaaga Vazhakkaadattum Endraan.
32 than Palipeedaththaith Thagarththadhinimiththam Paagaal Avanode Vazhakkaadattum Endru Solli, Annaalile Avanukku Yerupaagaal Endru Peridappattadhu.
33 meedhiyaaniyarum Amalekkiyarum Kizhakkaththip Puththirar Yaavarum Egamaaikkoodi, Aatraik Kadandhuvandhu, Yesrayel Pallaththaakkile Paalayamiranginaargal.
34 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Aaviyaanavar Kidhiyonmel Iranginaar; Avan Ekkaalam Oodhi, Abiyesriyaraik Kooppittu, Thanakkup Pinsellumpadi Seydhu,

35 manaase Naadengum Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi, Avargalaiyum Kooppittu, Thanakkup Pin Sellumpadi Seydhu, Aaser, Sebulon, Napthali Naadugalilum Aatkalai Anuppinaan; Avargalum Avanukku Edhirkonduvandhaargal.
36 appozhudhu Kidhiyon Dhevanai Nokki: Dhevareer Sonnapadi En Kaiyinaale Isravelai Ratchikkavendumaanaal,

37 idho, Naan Mayirulla Oru Tholaik Kalaththile Podugiren; Pani Tholinmel Maaththiram Peydhu, Boomiyellaam Kaaindhirundhaal, Appozhudhu Dhevareer Sonnapadi Isravelai En Kaiyinaal Ratchippeer Endru Adhinaale Ariven Endraan.
38 appadiye Aayitru. Avan Marunaal Kaalame Ezhundhirundhu, Tholaikkasakki, Adhilirundha Panineerai Oru Kinnam Niraiyappizhindhaan.

39 appozhudhu Kidhiyon Dhevanai Nokki: Naan Innum Oruvisaimaaththiram Pesugiren, Umadhu Kobam En Mel Moolaadhiruppadhaaga; Tholinaale Naan Innum Orevisai Sodhanaipannattum; Tholmaaththiram Kaaindhirukkavum Boomiyengum Pani Peydhirukkavum Kattalaiyidum Endraan.
40 appadiye Dhevan Andru Raaththiri Seydhaar; Tholmaaththiram Kaaindhirundhu, Boomiyengum Pani Peydhirundhadhu.
